titles.title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to permit certain additional depository institutions to serve as eligible lenders under the guaranteed student loan program.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education.

bill.summary: 12/18/1987--Introduced. Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to permit certain additional depository institutions to serve as eligible lenders under the Guaranteed Student Loan Program. (Allows such lending to be their primary, so long as it is not their sole, consumer credit function.)
